text: The 1908–09 international cricket season was from September 1908 to April 1909. The season consists with a single international tour. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | | | Philadelphia |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |1–2 [3] |; style="text-align:center"| — |} ==February== === Philadelphia in Jamaica === {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="9"|First-class Series |- ! No. ! Date ! Home captain ! Away captain ! Venue ! Result |- | Match 1 || 15–16 February || Frank Pearce || JH Mason || Sabina Park, Kingston || by 9 wickets |- | Match 2 || 17–18 February || Frank Pearce || JH Mason || Kensington Park, Kingston || Philadelphia by 172 runs |- | Match 3 || 10–20 February || Frank Pearce || JH Mason || Melbourne Park, Kingston || Philadelphia by 8 wickets |} ==References== Category:International cricket competitions by season Category:1908 in cricket Category:1909 in cricket
title: International cricket in 1908–09
